column4: Congrats with the release of 7.04! Finally my Wireless card is working and I'm enjoying the exploration. How do I install Opera on 7.04. They have not listed a 7.04 version, may I use a previous version? See http://www.opera.com/download/
I think you need the 9.2 version
there is a version of opera that works on feisty, i have used it
